message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR 

This paper is primarily focused on image synthesis for training accurate and robust scene text detection and recognition models, which falls under the computer vision (cs.CV) sub-category. Additionally, the paper leverages semantic segmentation research to achieve semantic coherence in the synthesized images, which could also place it under the natural language processing (cs.CL) sub-category. The paper also mentions the use of adaptive text appearance models, which could fall under the machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. Finally, the paper evaluates its proposed technique over five public datasets, which could place it under the information retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category.
